title: Google\Cloud\Speech\SpeechHelpersTrait
name: SpeechHelpersTrait
description: Provides helper functions for generated Speech clients.

methods.name: createAudioStreamFromResource
methods.description: Convert a PHP resource instance into an iterable of data "chunks".

params.name: resource
params.description: The resource object to read data from.

params.name: chunkSize
params.description: The chunk size to use, in bytes. Defaults to 32000

returns.description: An iterable of strings that have been read from the resource.
